actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Committee on Post Office and Civil Service discharged in House.
Measure passed Senate, in lieu of S. J. Res. 135.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for designation of Friday, March 7, 1980, as "Teacher Day, United States of America".

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Authorizes and requests the President to designate Friday, March 7, 1980, as "Teacher Day, United States of America."

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for designation of the first Friday of March as "Teacher Day, U.S.A.".
A joint resolution to provide for designation of Friday, March 7, 1980, as "Teacher Day, United States of America".
